description:
Undercover police agent in "Heaven`s Hole", a part of Tokyo that normal police has little access to. Apparently on very good terms with http://anidb.net/ch25723 [Robert DeVice] though details are never disclosed.
Provides http://anidb.net/ch13443 [Katsumi Liqueur] and http://anidb.net/ch25723 [Robert DeVice] with new equipment after they crashed into "Heaven`s Hole" with their "Spinner" police aircraft (that has been sabotaged by http://anidb.net/ch25772 [Roy`s police superiors]).
name: Chrome
